content:
I want to find the span of previously defined ident in name resolution. How to that?
In detail, see https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80012/files#r548876218
I found that NameBindings have a span, does that help? https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_resolve/struct.NameBinding.html
Thanks! I'll try to find let NameBinding defined before using for const.
